Uses of Package
com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor

  • Packages that use com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app
    Provides a concrete rules engine that uses the SharedTuplePlatform to exchange tuples between engines.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform
    Provides the basic framework for sharing data within or between JVMs.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor
    Provides a framework for monitoring the operation of the AbstractSharedData platform.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor.debugger
    Provides a client/server platform monitoring pair.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app 
    Class and Description
    AbstractMonitorEvent 
    IMonitorEvent
    Defines methods required on all monitoring events.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform 
    Class and Description
    IPlatformEventServer
    An object that can log IMonitorEvents that can be shared with listening clients.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor 
    Class and Description
    AbstractMonitorEvent 
    AbstractMonitoringClient
    Provides a helper class to capture IMonitorEvents being sent from a monitored platform.
    IClientEventHandler
    Defines method that will receive monitored platform events.
    IMonitorEvent
    Defines methods required on all monitoring events.
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor used by com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.monitor.debugger 
    Class and Description
    AbstractMonitorEvent 
    AbstractMonitoringClient
    Provides a helper class to capture IMonitorEvents being sent from a monitored platform.
    AbstractMonitoringServer
    Provides a way to log IMonitorEvents.
    IClientEventHandler
    Defines method that will receive monitored platform events.
    IMonitorEvent
    Defines methods required on all monitoring events.
    IPlatformEventServer
    An object that can log IMonitorEvents that can be shared with listening clients.
